name: Platformer Game 2021
description:
This is the world hardest platformer game ever. 

Do you have what it takes to become the best platformer gamer ever then this is the game for you?

Note this game will no longer get an update but in 2022 I will make a better and more cooler platformer game.

This game is free to download.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move.

Press ESC to exit the game.

My friend was able to beat the game.

Thanks for reading! :)
